Member Function Documentation

void physics.GunPanel.setAngle ( double  angleValue  ) 

Set the angle of the gun and automatically refresh the image to correspond to the updated value of the angle.

Parameters:
angleValue the value that is set for the angle. Internally presented in radians but degrees value is added and automatic transformation is hold immedialety.
